plugin.name: switcher
plugin._long: A plugin to change active window with an animation.

option.name: next_view
option._long: Switches to the next view with the specified key.

option.name: prev_view
option._long: Switches to the previous view with the specified key.

option.name: speed
option._long: Sets the duration of the animation in milliseconds.

option.name: view_thumbnail_rotation
option._long: Sets the thumbnail rotation in degrees.
